intro: Cynoglossum officinale var. purpureum, commonly known as purple forget-me-not, is a flowering plant in the Boraginaceae family. It is characterized by its striking violet-blue flowers with white centers, which bloom in late spring to early summer. The plant has heart-shaped, hairy leaves that are typically arranged in a basal rosette. Native to Europe, it thrives in moist, shaded environments such as woodlands and stream banks. Its ornamental value makes it a popular choice for garden cultivation.
